articles.title: Sanofi, GSK Covid Vaccine To Be Ready Only At The End Of 2021 - NDTV
articles.description: France's Sanofi and Britain's GSK said Friday their Covid-19 vaccines will not be ready until the end of 2021, after interim results showed a low immune response in older adults.
